Title: Relates to allowing one license plate to be issued for a vehicle
Summary: Relates to allowing, for a fee, one license plate to be issued and displayed on the rear of a vehicle; directs funds gathered to be deposited in the New York state wireless telephone emergency account.
LawCode: Amd ยง401, V & T L; amd ยง97-qq, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the state finance law, in relation to allowing for a fee for one license plate to be issued and displayed on the rear of a vehicle
